message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take $6,000 and you take $4,000. It's a good starting point!
You took $6,000 last round, I'll take a bit more this time. Still a good starting point!
Considering the decrease in value, I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting closer to the middle, but I think I can do better than that. Meet me at $6000!
